item.title: New poll: Aussies back Ukraine — with or without the US
item.description:
Australia’s total support for Ukraine is more than $1.7 billion. Australians know what’s at stake: ? Foreign relations shaped by authoritarian bullies ⚖️ A future where justice and democracy are eroded ? A world where aggression goes unchecked
Why does Australia, a non NATO member, partner with Ukraine? Australia has delivered this support by working closely across government, and in consultation with Ukraine and international partners in pursuit of two key objectives: 1) helping Ukraine to end the war on its own terms and 2) holding Russia accountable for its actions.

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @EvilCatCreations made this cool bookend! Love it.
27 Man Tax: James Gandolfini
“What is the use of being wise if we are not sometimes merry?” - Robertson Davies I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett

item.title: Soon I'll be annoyed again, I'm sure
item.description: My house was always the safe place, full of teens who weren't allowed to be themselves at home. Queer, trans, or just vaguely neglected, it didn't matter. They all knew that within my home, they were safe, and they all looked forward to crowding around my dinner table, wolfing down food and enjoying the company. They got older, many moving away or going to college, and I always have a bit too much leftovers. Realized I missed "my kids," even if sometimes I didn't even know their names, just that they were welcome at my table. My youngest just turned 13, and two friends came over after school. I asked who was staying for dinner, and their faces lit up. As I was cooking homemade chicken tacos, one of the kids said their parents never cook, expecting them to make themselves food and often eat alone. I know this isn't unusual, but every time I've met one of these kids, they are always excited to help set the table and eat a big communal meal. I expect I'll have my big loud pile of kids doomscrolling and swapping memes on my couch again soon enough.

item.title: We lost a legend today ...
item.description:
Steven Lee Cropper (October 21, 1941 – December 3, 2025), sometimes known as "The Colonel", was an American guitarist, songwriter and record producer. He was the guitarist of the Stax Records house band, Booker T. & the M.G.'s, which backed artists such as Otis Redding, Wilson Pickett, Sam & Dave, Carla Thomas, Rufus Thomas, and Johnnie Taylor. He also acted as the producer of many of these records. He was later a member of the Blues Brothers band. Rolling Stone magazine ranked him 36th on its list of the 100 greatest guitarists of all time, while he won two Grammy Awards from his seven nominations.
Steve's the guy with the white guitar behind Elwood when the Blues Brothers made their SNL debut back in 1978 RIP to a legend - you'll be missed.

item.title: GovBrief Today #307
item.description: "When you get an order, you move out fast and don't ask questions." That's what Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told a retiring four-star admiral concerned about the legality of killing people in boat attacks, even though the command's top lawyer shared his concerns. Now a different admiral who gave the order has been summoned to Capitol Hill tomorrow amid bipartisan furor over what is being called a potential war crime. At the FDA, the top drug regulator quit after only three weeks, saying the plans to bypass career scientists may be illegal. Today, twelve former commissioners published a joint rebuke calling the agency's claims a misrepresentation of science. Tomorrow, a vaccine advisory committee Kennedy packed with loyalists meets to vote on changing the childhood immunization schedule. The new chair is an anti-mRNA vaccine critic with no policy background. Congress is moving on the boat strikes. Make sure they move on vaccines too. Call your senators and representative today on both. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every GovBrief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. You'll get data, images, quotes, and links to help you get engaged. Sign up at govbrief.today or on Substack. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-more-somali-criticism [2] https://go.govbrief.today/nigeria-christian-visa-ban [3] https://go.govbrief.today/illinois-vaccine-guidelines [4] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-fuel-standards-rollback [5] https://go.govbrief.today/fed-president-veto [6] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-holsey-resignation [7] https://go.govbrief.today/survivors-known-boat-attack [8] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-pentagon-breach [9] https://go.govbrief.today/james-sarcone-dispute [10] https://go.govbrief.today/minnesota-new-orleans [11] https://go.govbrief.today/adm-bradley-congress [12] https://go.govbrief.today/smith-house-deposition [13] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-cuellar-pardon [14] https://go.govbrief.today/epa-workers-fired-dissent [15] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-leiweke-pardon [16] https://go.govbrief.today/us-peace-renamed-trump [17] https://go.govbrief.today/gentile-no-restitution [18] https://go.govbrief.today/fda-experts-criticism Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
